tags: Avions sans pilote de ciblage ou de reconnaissance
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
=====================================

**Tender Title:** F1477-220020 - Drone

**Tender Reference Number:** WS3927222280-Doc3960869554

**Amendment Number:** 1

**Publication Date:** June 14, 2023

**Tender Closing Date:** June 30, 2023, at 2:00 PM (EST)

**Amendment Date:** June 23, 2023

**Tender Status:** Closed

**Solicitation Number:** WS3927222280

**Government of Canada Contact Information:**

* Contact Name: Shaylan Stein
* Email: shaylan.stein@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* End User Entities:
	+ Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO)

**Scope of Work:**
The Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) has a requirement for a remotely piloted aircraft system (RPAS) with a LiDAR payload and the supplementary software required to produce ground classified point clouds for design and research purposes.

**Contracting Entity:**

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5

**Regions of Delivery:** British Columbia

**Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

**Trade Agreements:** Bidder may be eligible for the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

**Additional Information:**

* Tender documents are available at: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16586836?extsite=MTY1ODY4MzZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

The Department of Fisheries and Oceans (
